section.title: PHP INI Builder
section.text: Create PHP `parse_ini_string` / `parse_ini_file` compatible INI strings from associative arrays.

section.title: Example
section.text: Here is a simple example script:
section.source:
[Title] str = 'awesome' int = 7 flt = 10.2
[Title 2] bool = true arr[] = 'a' arr[] = 'b' arr[] = 'c' arr[6] = 'd' arr[] = 'e' arr[key] = 'f'
